verses.roman:
'kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa kaha' kari' prabhu yabe balila
'kṛṣṇa' kahi' vyāghra-mṛga nācite lāgila

synonyms: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa kaha—chant Kṛṣṇa, Kṛṣṇa; kari'-in this way; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yabe—when; balila—uttered; kṛṣṇa kahi'-chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; vyāghra-mṛga—the tigers and deer; nācite lāgila—began to dance.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said,"Chant Kṛṣṇa! Kṛṣṇa!" the tigers and deer began to dance and chant, "Kṛṣṇa!"
